titles.title: A bill to reinstate the taxation of foreign oil related income, and for other purposes.
A bill to reinstate the taxation of foreign oil related income, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to reinstate provisions that tax certain foreign oil-related income as foreign base company income under Subpart F (i.e., income of a controlled foreign corporation earned outside the United States). The provisions were repealed in P.L. 115-197 (commonly referred to as the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act).
